abilities.name: Time Travel
abilities.effect: If an opponent's attack would Knock Out Celebi, flip a coin. If heads, Celebi is not Knocked Out and you shuffle it and all cards attached to it into your deck. This power doesn't work if Celebi is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Psychic Damage
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, put 1 damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.
